mapper.insert: insert into userTB (id, password, nickName, phone_number, gender, n_id, i_id, sAgr, eAgr, serviceAgr, privatAgr) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickName}, #{phone_number}, #{gender}, #{n_id}, #{i_id}, #{sAgr}, #{eAgr}, #{serviceAgr}, #{privatAgr})
insert into areaTB(id, mLocate, sLocate) values (#{id}, #{mLocate}, #{sLocate})
insert into interestTB (id, first, seconde, third) values (#{id}, #{first}, #{seconde}, #{third})
insert into addressTB(id, name, address, detail, zipCode, basic) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{detail}, #{zipCode}, #{basic})
mapper.delete: delete from addressTB where id=#{id} and aNum=#{aNum}
